435520.name: Sebastien Loeb Rally EVO Demo
435520.description:
Download the demo and see how well you handle the rally in Mexico!
Join the race behind the wheel of a Ford Escort RS Cosworth, a Toyota Celica ST185 GTFour, a Suzuki Swift S1600 and a Ford Fiesta RS Rally Car. 4 vehicles from 3 different categories in which you can test your driving abilities on one of the dustiest tracks in Sébastien Loeb Rally EVO!
Discover all the cars, game modes and race through over 186 miles of track and 5 rallycross circuits that await you in the full game!
435520.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语*, 意大利语*, 德语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙*, 日语*, 波兰语*, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
